channel.title: Xavier's Thoughts
channel.description: I am a senior software engineer working mostly in Java. I live in Montreal. Everything I write in this blog do not engage the responsibility of anyone else.

item.title: From JBake to Hubpress
item.description:
Somedays ago I watched a 2015 Devoxx Fr Video about Asciidoc and Hubpress and I chose to migrate my blog from JBake to Hubpress.

Already liked Asciidoc but I was not totally satisfied with JBake so I decided to give Hubpress a try. Will tell you about it after some posts.
item.dc:creator: mikrethor
